news_header: World Property Ventures announces a $350 million joint-venture funding round for its subsidiary, World Property Markets, to enhance global real estate search platforms using AI and innovative technologies.
news_text: Michael Gerrity, founder of Miami-based World Property Ventures (WPV), revealed that WPV's subsidiary, World Property Markets, will launch a $350 million joint-venture funding round with industry partners. World Property Markets focuses on large-scale property listing search platforms, including Global Listings, World Property Search, and Better MLS. Gerrity emphasized the need to leverage AI and innovative approaches to improve the efficiency and transparency of the global real estate market, aiming to index and democratize property listings for all stakeholders. The goal is to create AI-powered global search platforms comparable to future leaders like Google and Amazon in the real estate sector.
